text: The Motte Aldeberg is a Motte. It is called often only Alde Berg. The location is in the Helpensteiner Bachtal between the town subdivisions Arsbeck and RÃ¶dgen of Wegberg in the Heinsberg Rural District in North Rhine-Westphalia. It is the biggest and best preserved Motte in Europe and is located between the rivers Meuse and Rhine. Category:Heinsberg Rural District Category:Castles in Germany
title: Motte Aldeberg
